articles.title: Buttermilk scones recipe: How to make Queen's favourite Royal Ascot tea scones - Express
articles.description: THE QUEEN will be watching Royal Ascot from home this year at races go ahead behind doors. But she will still enjoy afternoon tea at Windsor Castle and Royal Ascot chefs have shared how to make their special buttermilk scones.
